name: Devoid of Shadows

The gameplay is rapid, bloodthirsty and intransigent and doesn't forgive a single mistake. Devoid of Shadows is a heat in the chill dungeons of the Labyrinth!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2,5 GHz or analogue Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT ATI or Radeon HD 3870 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 8 GB available space
